short_desc: Provides a wide range of support services for young adults, including mental health care, employment and educational support, benefits advocacy, group activities, life skills training, crisis support, and housing
description: Provides a wide range of support services for young adults, including mental health care, employment and educational support, benefits advocacy, group activities, life skills training, psychiatric services, crisis support, and housing. Specific services are dependent on each participant's needs. Staff provide most services to program participants in the community, their residence or at their workplace.
